title: ennai nI anbu
sahitya:
ennai nI anbu seidavaL illai ena nAn inrarindEnE arindEnE


anupallavi

  munnum nigazhdavai ninaindarindEn puraNAi nIyum naDandadellAm eNNiyE


caraNam    tinni vAzhvadE vAzhvAm eNNamadil undinruppadE iruppadE azhagA
pinnum solvadEn peNNe un anbu sErvadum poyyEn ena nAn arindEnE arindEnE
